channel.title: Need staff for your server? check this out!
channel.description:
i am looking for a good server to be staff on.
My expirence- i have hosted my own server before and my computer got trashed so my server dissapeared, but i have been co- owner in 3 servers cause i helped code for the servers, i was admin for atleast 12 servers because i was alwase there to help new players and/or owners and i was alwase nice. and only mod 5 times cause i was a helpful person and easy to talk to, and did what i was told.
im a hard worker, honest, fun to talk to, great listener, alwase on!!!, and ive had my own server so if your looking for staff im here! Thanks - Trev Who

item.title: Need staff for your server? check this out!
item.dc:creator: @ApocalypseX ApocalypseX
item.description:
@ApocalypseX wrote:

Get Blitz:

Instead try applying in a Development Team?

This just might be the only decent post in this thread, as instead of flaming/trolling redirecting him.
Go to Development Team.

Read full topic
